From Stars to Life

Celebrating the Scientific Legacy of Ralph Pudritz


An international workshop
June 25-27, 2025
McMaster University, Hamilton, ON, Canada

Program Overview

A mixture of scientific and homecoming events. More information coming soon.

Funding

Funding to cover travel costs of invited speakers. More information coming soon.

In person or hybrid?

The meeting will be a hybrid event, to accommodate speakers and participants who can not make it to Hamilton. We would love to see you in Hamilton but if you aren't able to be here with us we encourage you to participate remotely. We are considering special events for remote participants.
